name: f5xc-terraform-mcp
description: MCP server providing AI assistants with access to F5 Distributed Cloud Terraform provider documentation, 270+ OpenAPI specifications, subscription tier information, and addon service activation workflows.

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_discover
tools.description: Discover available F5XC Terraform tools with optional schema details for lazy loading

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_docs
tools.description: Search, get, or list F5XC Terraform documentation (operations: search, get, list)

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_api
tools.description: Query 270+ F5XC OpenAPI specs (operations: search, get, find_endpoints, get_definition, list_definitions)

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_subscription
tools.description: Check F5XC resource subscription tiers (operations: resource, property)

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_addon
tools.description: List, check activation, and get workflows for F5XC addon services (operations: list, check, workflow)

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_get_summary
tools.description: Get a summary of all available F5XC documentation and API specifications
